data.title: Downtown Norfolk
data.text:
Date and Time for this Past Event

Location

visit website

Details

This show has been rescheduled from Saturday January 20, 2024 to Thursday June 13, 2024. Ticketholders - there is nothing you need to do, your original tickets are valid for the new date and will be honored at the door.

Craig Ferguson, an Emmy Award-winning actor, writer, and comedian, has enjoyed a diverse career across film, television, and stage. He recently reprised his role as 'Gobber' in "How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World" and published his memoir, "Riding the Elephant," in May 2019. Ferguson won two Daytime Emmys as host of "Celebrity Name Game," wrapped up his popular SiriusXM show, and toured North America with his "Hobo Fabulous" comedy tour. Known for his ten-year tenure on "The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson," which earned a Primetime Emmy nomination and a Peabody Award, Ferguson's early career includes acting in "The Drew Carey Show" and hosting "Join or Die." With numerous films, bestselling books, and acclaimed stand-up specials, Ferguson continues to be a dynamic force in entertainment, performing in sold-out venues across the country.
